sentences.english: He was so strong when he burst into the area and scored so many goals.
sentences.chinese: 当他突入禁区的时候他是那么强大，射入那么多进球。

sentences.english: For decades, the island was completely off-limits.
sentences.chinese: 数十年来，这个岛一直都是禁区。

sentences.english: And he hopes Kyrgiakos's abilities in opponents' penalty areas will rub off.
sentences.chinese: 他认为基叔的能力足以化解对手在禁区内制造地威胁。

sentences.english: That was until Sinclair cracked it home with a fantastic diagonal shot.
sentences.chinese: 直到辛克莱禁区斜角的梦幻施射才破门。

sentences.english: "Everything is permitted" does not mean that nothing is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: “一切都是允许的”，但这并不意味着没有禁区。

sentences.english: The exact boundary of the prohibited zone is delineated by hatching on the drawing shown in the Schedule.
sentences.chinese: 有关禁区的确实范围已用影线绘于附表内图则上。

sentences.english: He has entered a forbidden area, he is a confirmed celibate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经进入了一个禁区，证实他是一个独身主义者。

sentences.english: Closed Area defensive side foul, offensive side or indirect punishment completely arbitrary ball.
sentences.chinese: 禁区内防守方犯规，进攻方罚点球或间接任意球。

sentences.english: The new acupuncture treatment has opened up the forbidden zone of deaf-muteness and has cured many" incurable" diseases.
sentences.chinese: 新针疗法打开了聋哑禁区，治愈了多种“不治之症”。

sentences.english: A thoroughly entertaining half ended with Kakà volleying wide from just inside the area.
sentences.chinese: 令人兴奋的上半场以卡卡的禁区内近射偏出而结束。

sentences.english: The Brazilian beat Bassi from the edge of the area.
sentences.chinese: 这位巴西球员在禁区边缘击败了巴希。

sentences.english: As early as the fourth minute, he had bamboozled Scotland with a fluent run from right wing to penalty box.
sentences.chinese: 第四分钟，他从右翼到禁区的跑动骗过了苏格兰人。

sentences.english: The prohibited area and restricted area specified in the preceding paragraph are defined in accordance with State regulations.
sentences.chinese: 前款规定的禁区和限制区，依照国家规定划定。

sentences.english: Shevchenko went on a solo run which was only halted inside the area by the lunging Rost.
sentences.chinese: 舍甫琴科不久又单骑闯关，但在禁区内被罗斯特阻止。
电梯和楼梯是我的禁区。

sentences.english: Jackson: Going to a relly special place I know.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊并不知道这里已经变成“地热禁区”。

definition: to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
